intrebare?: What are the key components of an effective landing page for online advertising.
raspuns1: A compelling headline, engaging visuals, trust indicators and key benefits and features of the offer or product.
raspuns2: Keywords, backlinks, and paid advertising, as well as fast loading times, easy navigation, and mobile optimization.
raspuns3: Broken links, PPC advertising, duplicate content, and affiliate marketing.
raspuns4: Emerging technologies like AI, chatbots, Augmented and Virtual Reality.
raspuns corect: A compelling headline, engaging visuals, trust indicators and key benefits and features of the offer or product.

intrebare?: Describe the concept of long-tail keywords in the context of SEO.
raspuns1: They are the shorter keywords phrases, more common and more competitive search queries.
raspuns2: They are longer, more specific keyword phrases that users typically use, representing less common and less competitive search queries.
raspuns3: They represent the most common keywords used, regardless of their length.
raspuns4: These type of keywords are not significant in the context of SEO due to the fact that they are less likely to be used by users.
raspuns corect: They are longer, more specific keyword phrases that users typically use, representing less common and less competitive search queries.

intrebare?: What metrics or KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) are most commonly used to measure the success of a social media marketing campaign?
